Package sailingclub.server.sqlmanagment

Class SQLTranslator

java.lang.Object
sailingclub.server.sqlmanagment.SQLTranslator
public class SQLTranslator extends Object
This class represent a translator between client Request and SQL statement and also a translator between SLQ results and server Response

  • Method Details

    • requestToSql

      public String requestToSql(Request request) throws RequestToSQLException, IOException
      allows the translation from a client Request to a SQL statement
      Parameters:
      request - the client Request
      Returns:
      the SQL statement as string
      Throws:
      RequestToSQLException
      IOException

    • sqlToResponse

      public Response sqlToResponse(List<Map<String,String>> queryResult) throws SQLToResponseException, IOException
      allows the translation from a SQL result to a Response
      Parameters:
      queryResult - the result of the last query execution
      Returns:
      a Response that contains the result for the client
      Throws:
      SQLToResponseException
      IOException
